verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: at town hall in venice garcetti] [V: faces] [ARG1: anger over homeless shelter plan for four hours] los angeles mayor eric garcetti took the heat from a crowd in venice locals booed catcalled and criticized the city plans to build a 154-bed homeless shelter on an abandoned metropolitan transportation authority yard in the heart of the seaside community councilman mike bonin venice homeless shelter metropolitan transportation authority boos town hall eric garcetti police chief michel moore los angeles city hall los angeles city hall catcalled
